name: scraper-agent-marketplace
description: Automated scraper generation system for data collection pipelines

plugins.name: scraper-dev
plugins.description: Automated scraper generation for data collection pipelines with support for HTTP/REST APIs, website parsing, FTP/SFTP, and email attachments. Generates type-safe, mypy and ruff compliant code with automatic quality checking. Features tabbed question interface for better UX. Includes version tracking, scraper maintenance tools (/fix-scraper, /update-scraper), self-contained Kafka notification support, and optional config file pre-configuration.
